titles.title: A bill to provide that a reduction in force order applicable to employees of the Tennessee Valley Authority shall be implemented, to the greatest extent practicable, in accordance with any collective bargaining agreement applicable to those employees.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 6/28/1988--Introduced. Provides that if a reduction-in-force is required with respect to employees of the Tennessee Valley Authority who are covered by a collective bargaining agreement, then such reduction-in-force shall be implemented, to the extent practicable, in accordance with the agreement in lieu of any regulation which gives effect to efficiency or performance ratings of employees.
